key_risks: Environmental concerns and legal challenges related to K-Cup pod recyclability
Regulatory and legal risks from changes in sugar content, labeling, and environmental policies
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on raw materials like coffee beans, aluminum, and plastic
Competitive pressures from major beverage companies and emerging niche brands
controversies: SEC charges and $10 million settlement over misleading recyclability claims
Labor disputes and unfair labor practice cases filed with the NLRB
environmental_issues: Scrutiny over the recyclability of K-Cup pods and environmental practices
Commitment to making 100% of K-Cup pods recyclable by 2025 under close watch
social_issues: Labor disputes and allegations of unfair labor practices
Statements on forced labor and child labor in the supply chain
governance_issues: Inaccurate statements in annual reports regarding recyclability
Challenges in enforcing ethical sourcing commitments
